content.body: Chatting with Mark yesterday, we realized that the wasm shared everything thread is pretty strict about shared stuff not being able to access non shared stuff. Which brings the question, are there no use cases where shared funcs need to "call" a host function (which I assume is non-shared?). How would that work?
